scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /s /q cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /s /q cypress\videos
scripts.allure:history: if exist allure-report\history xcopy /s /y allure-report\history allure-results\history\ && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
